summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1411 m), feels like temperature (up 3.5°C), outside temperature (up 3.0°C), and light levels (up 5322 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 64.9m higher than yesterday, 791.0m lower than the past week, 1411.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1330.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2120m and 2740m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
